text: I'm building some calculators and other sales process forms where the requirements were not possible with standard properties. Some of theses forms would have a better UI if I could put the text inputs in a two or three column layout.

I few things I've built so far.
1. A center tab to quickly add a a co-applicant contact to a deal with association label
2. A sidebar card for displaying gross sales by year with % increase/decrease using a stats block and form with year and amount. form adds or updates the stat
3. A sidebar card to calculate estimated fees 
4. A Center tab to present a user friendly preview of an application custom object data
5. A center tab to show the results of a quiz survey
